description:
1、 Live migration of volume backed instances
2、at pre_live_migration function,  the table of block_device_mapping has been updated as destination  host volume lun information
3、at /nova/compute/manager.py  _post_live_migration function， when call  the funfunction 
     block_device_info = self._get_instance_block_device_info( ctxt, instance, bdms) , because the  Parameters is incorrect , the 
     table of block_device_mapping will be changed as the source host volume lun information. 
4、the next step ,when run the function /nova/compute/manager.py  post_live_migration_at_destination ,will query volume lun connection from the table of block_device_mapping, but  the table has been updated as  source host volume lun information,so
the destination  host  run the under function will failed. :
          self.volume_driver_method('connect_volume',
                                               connection_info,
                                               disk_dev)
title: Live migration of volume backed instances broken because  the table of block_device_mapping was updated incorrect

comments.content:
this issue because is the function Parameters  is incorrect :
block_device_info = self._get_instance_block_device_info( ctxt, instance, bdms)

but this function define is :

def _get_instance_block_device_info(self, context, instance,
                                               refresh_conn_info=False,
                                               bdms=None):
we call only input three parameters , because bdms is not None ,so  refresh_conn_info is  the corresponding True.
so  the table of block_device_mapping was updated again.

we should changed as: /nova/compute/manager.py _post_live_migration function 
 block_device_info = self._get_instance_block_device_info( ctxt, instance, bdms) 
changed as the under :
 block_device_info = self._get_instance_block_device_info( ctxt, instance, False, bdms) 

this issue will be solved
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zheng-yao1
